name: Scroller Jumper GB
description:
Made for GBJAM 7. 

A Jump'N'Run (platformer) game, where the level repeats itself. Try to build up speed with the booster to reach distant platforms! 

Controls

You can choose between two different control schemes. 
There is only keyboard support.

Control Scheme
ABMoveW A S D
Left, Right, Up, Down
JumpKXGo back
JZStartEnterEnterSelectReturnReturn
